actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

official_title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to encourage airports to develop and implement recycling programs for newspapers and other recyclable items.

summary.text: Airport Recycling Act of 2000 - Amends Federal transportation law to make recycling programs for newspapers and other recyclable items an airport development activity, for which an airport improvement project may receive a grant. Declares it is U.S. policy that airports should develop and implement such programs.

titles.title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to encourage airports to develop and implement recycling programs for newspapers and other recyclable items.
